basic_info.description: My name is Maximiliano Zeballos. Enthusiast for web development and simple but aesthetically correct and consistent designs. I'm working with the newest front-end frameworks like React and Angular. I love teamwork, nothing better than several heads thinking in sync.

projects.title: Individual project about countries
projects.description: The most extended application I have had the opportunity to work with. I have learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by an awesome teacher. The application has filtering by Country, Population, Continents, search bar, allows you to search information about different countries from my own REST API.

projects.title: Clothing e-Commerce
projects.description: Personal project for a studio assignment. I was in charge of the design, as well as working on the logic part of the filtering, payment gateways, authentications, etc. I passed the same project, as well as I got an outstanding grade.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: Jedna z pierwszych aplikacji nad którymi pracowałam na stażu. Musiałam przygotować front-end dla aplikacji, która pokazuje modele 3D znanych budynków. To był także mój pierwszy projekt w frameworku Angular. Dużo się nauczyłam!

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
technologies: Guiar a los recién llegados al Curso
Ayudar en desarrollo personal y grupal
